channel.title: Highscores table
channel.description: i was wondering...how do i add a highscore table on my server....but i want it on a specific place..could some one give me the code or something so i can add or give me a link of a tut or something...thanks

item.title: Highscores table
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Justino Coder Justino
item.description:
@Coder_Justino wrote:

First Open Client.java and search for this

public boolean Dedtimer = true;

Then under that add this

[code]//In-game highscores
public int playerRank = 0;
public void resetRanks() {
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
server.ranks[i] = 0;
server.rankPpl[i] = “”;
}
}

public void highscores() {
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@", 8144); //Title
sendQuest("@dre@~In-Game Top 10 Highscores~", 8145);
for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { // you also need to change this for it to display more, simply the number you want it to display, say 20 = for(int i = 0; i < 20; i++)
if(server.ranks[i] > 0) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rank “+(i+1)+”: @red@"+server.rankPpl[i]+ "@bla@ - Total Lvl:@whi@ " +server.ranks[i], 8147+i);
}
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
resetRanks();
}
//end highscores[/code]

Next search this

// is being called regularily every 500ms

and under that add this

[code]//in-game highscores
playerLevel[24] = totalz;

for (int d = 0; d <= 10; d++) {
	if (totalz >= server.ranks[d]) {
		if (d == 0) {
			playerRank = d+1;
			server.ranks[d] = totalz;
			server.rankPpl[d] = playerName;
		}else if (d < 10){
			if (totalz < server.ranks[d-1]) {
				playerRank = d+1;
				server.ranks[d] = totalz;
				server.rankPpl[d] = playerName;
			}
		}else{
			if (totalz < server.ranks[d-1]) {
				playerRank = 0;
			}
		}
	}
}
//end highscores[/code]

Next search for

case 132:

then under that add this

//highscores if(objectID == 3192) { highscores(); }

then search for

case 39:

Under this add

// highscores if (playerRights == 0) { StatsMenu(); }

Next open Server.java and search for this

public static final int cycleTime = 500;

Under that add this

/*Highscores*/ /*For more highscores to be recorded, change the #s in [] to the number you want kept, +1*/ /*For example, if you want the top 20, put 21 in the [] ([21])*/ public static int[] ranks = new int[11]; public static String[] rankPpl = new String[11]; public static boolean updateServer = false; public static int updateSeconds = 180; //180 because it doesnt make the time jump at the start :P public static long startTime;

That should be all, correct me if I am wrong, I worked on this with all the time I could, Hope this helps!

Read full topic
